thread.section_title: Superior Van & Mobility Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Superior Van & Mobility | www.superiorvan.com
thread.title: WES SHEALEY
thread.title_full: Superior Van & Mobility reviewed by WES SHEALEY

author: WES SHEALEY
title: WES SHEALEY
text: When you are faced with having to purchase a wheelchair accessible van due to physical issues, it is not only the stress associated with a new car purchase but also the added emotional stress of why you are there in the first place that can overwhelm you. Jimmy Warner and the rest of the Superior family made this translation so much smoother than we anticipated and we couldn't be any more pleased with the entire process. I would not hesitate to recommend Superior to anyone who happens to find themselves in the market for an accessible vehicle.
